    Check for non-integer values in a matrix

    has_non_integer.Rd

    This function checks whether a numeric matrix contains any non-integer values.

    Usage

    has_non_integer(mat)

    Arguments

    mat

    A numeric matrix.

    Value

    A logical value: TRUE if any element is non-integer, otherwise FALSE.

    On this page

    Developed by Chang Su, Zichun Xu, Xinning Shan.
